targets.rawSql: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(total_records_queried), 0) as value FROM apr_daily_summary WHERE DATA = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(valid_records), 0) as value FROM apr_daily_summary WHERE DATA = CURDATE()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(invalid_nfechave + invalid_duplicata + invalid_seuno + invalid_cheque), 0) as value FROM apr_daily_summary WHERE DATA = CURDATE()

SELECT changed_at as Time, PROPOSTA as Proposal, CEDENTE as Client, OLD_STATUS as 'Old Status', NEW_STATUS as 'New Status', CHANGE_SOURCE as Source FROM apr_status_history WHERE changed_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR) ORDER BY changed_at DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT CHANGE_SOURCE as metric, COUNT(*) as value FROM apr_status_history WHERE DATE(changed_at) = CURDATE() GROUP BY CHANGE_SOURCE
